item.title: About
item.description:
A dedicated Backend Developer with over 3 years of experience specializing in WordPress Plugin Development. Highly proficient in PHP, React JS, and Gutenberg block development. Expertise in integrating complex e-commerce features and leveraging AI APIs (ChatGPT, TogetherAI) to automate content and image creation.

Technical Expertise

Core Languages

PHP, React JS, JavaScript, CSS, HTML

WordPress Development

Plugin & Theme Development, Gutenberg Blocks, Custom Post Types (CPTs), Hooks and Filters

E-commerce & Payments

PayPal, Stripe, Paddle PGW, WooCommerce Payments, PayU, Midtrans

item.title: Experience
item.description:
Backend Developer / WordPress Plugin Developer

Codewing Solutions | May 2021 â€“ Present

  • Spearheaded AI integration using the ChatGPT and TogetherAI APIs to automate recipe and image creation for plugins, significantly boosting content generation efficiency.
  • Integrated critical payment gateways, now including Paddle PGW, along with PayPal, Stripe, and others, ensuring robust e-commerce functionality.
  • Engineered complex and advanced features, including partial payments and an advanced itinerary builder.
  • Developed and maintained WordPress plugins using a modern stack (PHP for the backend and React JS for dynamic interfaces).
  • Led feature development for WP Delicious and contributed significantly to WP Travel Engine, coordinating releases.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
AI-Powered Content Automation

New Feature

Goal: Automated recipe and image creation within a plugin environment.

Technologies: ChatGPT API, TogetherAI API, PHP.

Achievement: Implemented logic to pass context-rich information to the API, enabling seamless, partial, and full recipe generation by the AI engine.

WP Travel Engine & Delicious Recipes

WordPress Plugins

Focus: Contributed to core functionality, developed premium features, and integrated global payment solutions like Paddle and Stripe.

Technologies: PHP, React, Gutenberg Blocks.
